description: Joie was hanging out with his best friend. And his best friend happens to be a straight dude. A very cute straight dude and a temptation of Joie's for years now. It can be difficult to be friends with a straight dude that is so totally hot. Today, however, was Joie's chance for seduction. His best friend came over and told him that he and his girlfriend broke up the previous night. Without wasting a single second, Joie swooped in for the rebound. Watch in amazement as Joie plows his straight friend's tight, virgin ass. Then witness Joie hose him down with globs of shinny, salty, glistening jizz.
title: Dick In Deep
